Network

On this page, I plan to create a visualization of my network. It's an idea Markus Reuter once wrote about. Some time after that I realized I wanted that, too.

Now, most exactly one year after Markus' blogpost, I began to build my new blog and finally want to create my own network site.

I'll get back to you soon.
